briefTitle: Randomized, Double-Blind, Multicenter, Placebo-Controlled Study Of Pregabalin For Pain Associated With Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathy

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Visual Analogue Scale (VAS) of pain is higher than 40 mm.
* Diagnosis of type 1 or 2 diabetes mellitus for at least 1 year

Exclusion Criteria:

* Malignancy within the past 2 years.
* Neurologic disorders unrelated to diabetic neuropathy that may confuse the assessment of neuropathy pain

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline to Study Endpoint in Mean Weekly Pain Scores
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline: Score at study endpoint minus score at baseline. Study endpoint is defined as the mean of the last seven entries of the daily pain diary using the 11-point numerical rating scale 0(no pain) to 10(worst possible pain) while on study medication up to and including day after last dose.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Short Form 36-Item (SF-36) Health Survey: Physical Functioning
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey Scores at study endpoint. Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey is scored from 0-100 with higher scores reflecting better patient status.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Short Form 36-Item (SF-36) Health Survey: Role Limitations-Physical
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey Scores at study endpoint. Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey is scored from 0-100 with higher scores reflecting better patient status.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Short Form 36-Item (SF-36) Health Survey: Bodily Pain
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey Scores at study endpoint. Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey is scored from 0-100 with higher scores reflecting better patient status.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Short Form 36-Item (SF-36) Health Survey: General Health Perception
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey Scores at study endpoint. Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey is scored from 0-100 with higher scores reflecting better patient status.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Short Form 36-Item (SF-36) Health Survey: Social Functioning
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey Scores at study endpoint. Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey is scored from 0-100 with higher scores reflecting better patient status.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Short Form 36-Item (SF-36) Health Survey: Role Limitations-Emotional
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey Scores at study endpoint. Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey is scored from 0-100 with higher scores reflecting better patient status.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline to Study Endpoint in Mean Weekly Pain Scores by Groups of Subjects With Expected Similar Plasma Concentrations
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline: Score at study endpoint minus score at baseline. Study endpoint is defined as the mean of the last seven entries of the daily pain diary using the 11-point numerical rating scale 0(no pain) to 10(worst possible pain) while on study medication up to and including day after last dose. Subjects are classified by exposure to pregabalin, which is estimated by creatinine clearance (CLcr).

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Responders
outcomeMeasures.description: A responder is defined as a subject with a 50% reduction in weekly mean pain score from baseline to study endpoint.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline at Week 1 in Mean Weekly Pain Scores
outcomeMeasures.description:
The mean change from baseline in mean weekly pain score from daily pain diary using the 11-point numerical rating scale 0(no pain) to 10(worst possible pain) at Week 1.

Change from baseline: Score at Week 1 minus score at baseline

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Short Form 36-Item (SF-36) Health Survey: Vitality
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey Scores at study endpoint. Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey is scored from 0-100 with higher scores reflecting better patient status.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Short Form 36-Item (SF-36) Health Survey: Mental Health
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey Scores at study endpoint. Short-Form 36-Item Health Survey is scored from 0-100 with higher scores reflecting better patient status.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Mean Sleep Interference Scores
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in the weekly mean sleep interference score at study endpoint. Score range is from 0-10. Higher scores indicate more severe interference with sleep.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Short-Form McGill Pain Questionnaire: Sensory Scores
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Short-Form McGill Pain Questionnaire Scores at study endpoint. Sensory score ranges from 0-33. Higher scores indicate more severe pain.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Short-Form McGill Pain Questionnaire: Affective Scores
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Short-Form McGill Pain Questionnaire Scores at study endpoint. Affective score ranges from 0-12. Higher scores indicate more severe pain.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Short-Form McGill Pain Questionnaire: Total Scores
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Short-Form McGill Pain Questionnaire Scores at study endpoint. Total score ranges from 0-45. Higher scores indicate more severe pain.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Short-Form McGill Pain Questionnaire: Visual Analogue Scale Scores
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Short-Form McGill Pain Questionnaire Scores at study endpoint. Visual Analogue Scale Score ranges from 0-100 mm. Higher scores indicate more severe pain.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Short-Form McGill Pain Questionnaire: Present Pain Intensity Scores
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Short-Form McGill Pain Questionnaire Scores at study endpoint. Present pain intensity score ranges from 0-5. Higher scores indicate more severe pain.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Medical Outcomes Study (MOS) - Sleep Scale: Sleep Disturbance
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Medical Outcomes Study - Sleep Scale Scores at study endpoint. Score for sleep disturbance ranges from 0-100. Higher scores indicate more severe pain.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Medical Outcomes Study (MOS) - Sleep Scale: Snoring
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Medical Outcomes Study - Sleep Scale Scores at study endpoint. Score for snoring ranges from 0-100. Higher scores indicate more of the attribute.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Medical Outcomes Study (MOS) - Sleep Scale: Sleep Shortness of Breath or Headache
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Medical Outcomes Study - Sleep Scale Scores at study endpoint. Score for sleep shortness of breath or headache ranges from 0-100. Higher scores indicate more of the attribute.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Medical Outcomes Study (MOS) - Sleep Scale: Quantity of Sleep
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Medical Outcomes Study - Sleep Scale Scores at study endpoint. Score for quantity of sleep ranges from 0-24. Higher scores indicate more of the attribute named in the subscale.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Medical Outcomes Study (MOS) - Sleep Scale: Sleep Adequacy
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Medical Outcomes Study - Sleep Scale Scores at study endpoint. Score for sleep adequacy ranges from 0-100. Higher scores indicate more of the attribute.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Medical Outcomes Study (MOS) - Sleep Scale: Somnolence
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Medical Outcomes Study - Sleep Scale Scores at study endpoint. Score for somnolence ranges from 0-100. Higher scores indicate more of the attribute.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Medical Outcomes Study (MOS) - Sleep Scale: Overall Sleep Problems Index
outcomeMeasures.description: The mean change from baseline in Medical Outcomes Study - Sleep Scale Scores at study endpoint. Score for overall sleep problems index ranges from 0-100. Higher scores indicate more of the attribute.

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinical Global Impression of Change
outcomeMeasures.description: Clinical Global Impression of Change is a clinician-rated instrument that measures change in patient's overall status on a 7-point scale ranging from 1 (very much improved) to 7 (very much worse).

outcomeMeasures.title: Patient Global Impression of Change
outcomeMeasures.description: The Patient Global Impression of Change is a patient-rated instrument that measures change in patient's overall status on a 7-point scale ranging from 1 (very much improved) to 7 (very much worse).

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline at Week 13 in Mean Weekly Pain Scores
outcomeMeasures.description:
The mean change from baseline in mean weekly pain score from daily pain diary using the 11-point numerical rating scale 0(no pain) to 10(worst possible pain) at Week 13.

Change from baseline: Score at Week 13 minus score at baseline
